tool_description: View upcoming events, fighters, fights and more from Spectation Sports.
name: Spectation Sports Events API
title: Spectation Sports Events API

api_list.name: Fighter
api_list.description: Get a single fighter by ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spectation-sports-events-api.p.rapidapi.com/fighters/1182"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spectation-sports-events-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://spectation-sports-events-api.p.rapidapi.com/fighters/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spectation-sports-events-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

ring
